title: Fragment, 16th century

Medium: silk

creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of yellow-green velvet with design of tiny hexagonal figure enclosing a central quatrefoil in cut velvet with ground of uncut velvet.
